attributes.action: stop making people believe cows milk is good for humans for selfish reasons
attributes.additional_details: People are so 'set in their ways' and need they're eyes opening to this as it's so unnecessary! Research the truth of the dairy industry! I am not vegan by the way so it's not a vegan petition either.
attributes.background: People have been made to believe that cows milk is genuinely good and has many health benefits for humans. However this is really not the case. In actual fact cows milk does pretty much the opposite for us, and isn't all that 'good for our bones'.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
